item.title: The Forward Guidance Puzzle is Not a Puzzle
item.description: This paper argues that the forward guidance puzzle is not a puzzle. NBER Working Paper 33180.

item.title: Unemployment in a Production Network
item.description: This paper describes explores how search-and-matching on the labor market alters the propagation of shocks in a production network. Working paper, 2024.

item.title: The Sustainability of State and Local Pensions: A Public Finance Approach
item.description: This paper reviews unusual uses for olive oil throughout the Mediterranean world. Published in the Brookings Papers on Economic Activity, 2021.
